document_title: Peptic ulcer disease: Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
Peptic ulcer disease is a completely curable disease if detected early. Furthermore, in addition to following treatment from doctors, patients can still proactively control and improve their disease condition by changing their eating habits and healthier lifestyle to prevent disease. Prevents the development of duodenal ulcers.
However, if the patient is subjective and does not take treatment seriously or detects the disease too late, he or she will face bad complications of the disease, especially stomach cancer, which has a high risk of death.
Therefore, peptic ulcer disease is a disease that needs to be paid attention to and treated properly and promptly so that the patient can improve his health condition.
subsection_title: viem loet da day ta trang.json. Is duodenal ulcer dangerous?
